messages.title: 3 reasons to vote for us
messages.content: Anna Souby MP has a proven record of action for Broxtowe and is the only candidate who can beat Labour here

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continue to create jobs and support small businesses by still cutting the deficit and delivering strong leadership
Invest millions into schools, local hospital and health services and protect Green Belt from inappropriate development
Secure investment in better bus, rail services and roads

mentions.tacticalSituation: Anna Soubry and the Conservatives are the only ones who can beat Labour

issues.economy: Don't let Labour ruin it again like they did with the chaos of 2010
issues.environment: Protect Green Belt from inappropriate development
issues.health: Invest millions into local hospital and health services

housing.content: Protect Green Belt from inappropriate development

leaflet.personalStatement: Anna was born and bred in Broxtowe where she lives with her family. She has a real plan for Broxtowe.
